page.title: 05S.MACKENZIE,ULLAPOOL.
page.content: My home is in Ullapool,Scotland.We are quite remote as the nearest town is over 50 miles away. In my family there are 5 people,my father,mother,sister Lyndsey,brother Aiden and myself. On a typical Thursday in my life,I get up about 8 a.m.,wash,dress and have my breakfast.At 8.55 a.m.my sister and I go to school. Meanwhile my Mum does the housework then makes lunch for Aiden,Dad and herself while we have our packed lunch in school. Mum does the shopping and at 3 p.m., goes to visit my Grandma who sometimes asks her to drive a school car. After school,I go to the Brownies where we play games or go for walks. At 5.30 p.m.I go home and have my dinner,do my school homework,visit the library,play and then bed at 9pm..
